DMUCutHdr.Title: Cut
DMUCutHdr.ShortHelp: Copies the selected elements to the clipboard and removes them from their original parent feature.
DMUCopyHdr.Title: Copy
DMUCopyHdr.ShortHelp: Copies the selected elements to the clipboard.
DMUPasteHdr.Title: Paste
DMUPasteHdr.ShortHelp: Duplicates all the features available on the clipboard.
DMUPasteSpecialHdr.Title: Paste Special
DMUPasteSpecialHdr.ShortHelp: Duplicates all the features of the selected feature types, available on the clipboard. This command is only available for slides and formats.
DMUSwitch3DMarkersResponsiveDisplayHdr.S: Hides 3D markers when zooming out, displays them again when zooming in.
DMUSwitch3DMarkersResponsiveDisplayHdr.L: To preserve the display of some 3D markers, select them before zooming out.
DMUNavOnImplementationLinksHdr.Title: Navigate On Implementation Links
DMUNavOnImplementationLinksHdr.ShortHelp: Navigates and focus on the elements pointed by an implementation link of the selected object.
DMUFocusOnRepresentationHdr.Title: Focus On
